title: "Touching the social robot PARO reduces pain perception and salivary oxytocin levels"
excerpt: "Human-human social touch improves mood and alleviates pain. No studies have so far tested the effect of human-robot emotional touch on experimentally induced pain ratings, on mood and on oxytocin levels in healthy young adults."
